channel.title: ~ Ultimate Bug Abuse ~
channel.description:
*
[b]~Guide to Flooding and the Possibilities~[/b]
To put flooding in simple terms...flooding on Runescape is an overflow of commands sent to the server that you are on. Targeting the server with so many specific commands allows your account, client and serverside, to perform MANY different types of bugs. The list of bugs you can perform is nearly endless.
List: Infinite Prayer, Freewalking ANY Cutscene, PKing Invisibly, Smuggle ANY Items, Smuggle Certain Effects, Safety, and MUCH more...
[b]Infinite Prayer - [/b]Infinite prayer points, duh. This is done by opening any interface(your choice), activating the flooding program, and allow your prayer to hit zero. With enough commands sent to the server, the server will completely ignore the command that tells the server to turn your prayer off after reaching zero. [b] Freewalking ANY Cutscene - [/b]This is very simple. Enter the dialogue with the NPC, turn on the flooding program, wait about 1-2 minutes, enter the cutscene, and click out of the cutscene. It will remove the Forced Teleport that tries to remove you from the cutscene and you will remain inside, free to walk around.
[b]PKing Invisibly - [/b]This one involves 80 Construction or a Scrying Pool in a friends house. Enter the Scry interface, turn on the program, wait 1-2 minutes, enter the Scrying Pool, and click out, done.
[b]Smuggling ANY Items - [/b]This is much harder than it seems, you will need a Controlled Forced Teleport for this. Apply your CFT, enter the Minigame of your choice, gather the items you want to smuggle, open any interface, turn on the program, wait 1-2 minutes, activate the CFT. The flooding removes the command that is sent from the server telling your game to remove the items from your inventory, as you CFT out. [b] Smuggle Certain Effects - [/b]This one is very complicated and I'd rather not waste a lot of time explaining this. It is useful but not useful enough for me to write about...
[b]Safety - [/b]A Safety allows you to die and keep all of your items. Basically, when your inside a Minigame such as, the Tzhaar Fight Caves, you are in a Safe area. That means if you die, you are teleported outside of that area with all of your items. You'll also need a CFT for this too. Enter the safe area with the CFT applied, open any interface, activate the flooder, wait 1-2 minutes, and then activate the CFT, and there you go.
This program connects directly to the server using a security exploit. This exploit may be fixed at anytime and we are not reliable for any damage caused by you or the program. If this exploit is fixed the program will cease to execute.
~Credits~
Jeremy Derek Mathias
~Credits~
Any donations are appreciated and will help support updates, please PM me if you would like to donate :) , thanks!

item.description:
@wtfscapey wrote:

~Guide to Flooding and the Possibilities~

To put flooding in simple terms…flooding on Runescape is an overflow of commands sent to the server that you are on. Targeting the server with so many specific commands allows your account, client and serverside, to perform MANY different types of bugs. The list of bugs you can perform is nearly endless.

It will remove the Forced Teleport that tries to remove you from the cutscene and you will remain inside, free to walk around.

PKing Invisibly - This one involves 80 Construction or a Scrying Pool in a friends house. Enter the Scry interface, turn on the program, wait 1-2 minutes, enter the Scrying Pool, and click out, done.

Smuggling ANY Items - This is much harder than it seems, you will need a Controlled Forced Teleport for this. Smuggle Certain Effects - This one is very complicated and I’d rather not waste a lot of time explaining this. It is useful but not useful enough for me to write about…

Safety - A Safety allows you to die and keep all of your items. Basically, when your inside a Minigame such as, the Tzhaar Fight Caves, you are in a Safe area.
